### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when placing pipe at an invalid position
- Ensure to check the surrounding area for obstructions before placing pipes. Move to a valid position if the initial position is blocked.

### Errors when connecting pipes
- Verify that the target pipe is not blocked by other entities before attempting to connect. If a connection fails, reassess the layout and ensure there are no obstructions.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.
